ValidationRule.description: An Opportunity cannot be closed won without a date and time selected for the handoff call.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"), $RecordType.Id = "012f4000000B1t5", ISBLANK(TEXT( Handoff_Call_Date_Time__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An Opportunity cannot be closed won without a date and time selected for the handoff call.
